TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoggerDescription extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class is used to contain information about a logger as a collection of values that can be used to instantiate the logger and can be serialized to be passed between different processes.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Create an ILogger out of the data in this description. This method may throw a variety of reflection exceptions if the data is invalid. It is the resposibility of the caller to handle these exceptions if desired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method may throw a variety of reflection exceptions if the data is invalid. It is the responsibility of the caller to handle these exceptions if desired.
